channel.title: GreyOldTwit - One Last Time [EP] + Announcement
channel.description:
GreyOldTwit - One Last Time [EP] is out now on Spotify and this release is a special release. This will be the last release under the name of GreyOldTwit. No I’m not leaving music making or Auxy (as I just got Auxy Jam recently), I just believe that my old name is more of a gaming name rather than a music artist name.
Sticking with a similar theme however, I’ve decided to call myself GR3Y. There’s not much more I can say at this point, but to enjoy the music under GreyOldTwit... for one last time.
https://open.spotify.com/album/37CWFQ3bke8LNDFn5AIsrl?si=vuOIwaEAQnuW9INZMQwTnA
**TRACK LIST:** - One Last Time - Midnight - Hear Me Out - Showdown - Nights with Thoughts (with @LittleSpikes) - Vete Conmigo (with @HAVS)

item.title: GreyOldTwit - One Last Time [EP] + Announcement
item.dc:creator: GR3Y
item.description:
GreyOldTwit - One Last Time [EP] is out now on Spotify and this release is a special release. This will be the last release under the name of GreyOldTwit. No I’m not leaving music making or Auxy (as I just got Auxy Jam recently), I just believe that my old name is more of a gaming name rather than a music artist name.

Sticking with a similar theme however, I’ve decided to call myself GR3Y. There’s not much more I can say at this point, but to enjoy the music under GreyOldTwit… for one last time.
